trans-unit.source: A factory method that creates a query that can be modified using LINQ.
trans-unit.target: A factory method that creates a query that can be modified using LINQ.

trans-unit.source: The query may be subsequently executed using one of the execution methods available for <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.CloudTable</codeEntityReference>, such as <codeEntityReference>!:ExecuteQuery</codeEntityReference>, <codeEntityReference>!:ExecuteQuerySegmented</codeEntityReference>, or <codeEntityReference>M:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.CloudTable.ExecuteQuerySegmentedAsync(Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.TableQuery,Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.TableContinuationToken)</codeEntityReference>.

trans-unit.source: A <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.TableQuery</codeEntityReference> object, specialized for type <codeInline>TElement</codeInline>, that may subsequently be executed.

trans-unit.source: The <codeEntityReference>N:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.Queryable</codeEntityReference> namespace includes extension methods for the <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.TableQuery</codeEntityReference> object, including <codeEntityReference>M:WithOptions</codeEntityReference>, <codeEntityReference>M:WithContext</codeEntityReference>, and <codeEntityReference>M:AsTableQuery</codeEntityReference>.

trans-unit.source: To use these methods, include a <codeInline>using</codeInline> statement that references the <codeEntityReference>N:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.Queryable</codeEntityReference> namespace.
